import React from 'react'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; // import FormCheck from 'react-bootstrap/FormCheck' // import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import Accordion from 'react-bootstrap/Accordion'; import AuthContext from '../../context/auth-context'; import DatePicker from 'react-bootstrap-date-picker'; import './CreateUserForm.css'; const CreateUserForm = (props) => { // console.log({...props}); console.log("CreateUserForm: ", AuthContext.token); return (
Email Password Name Role Phone D.O.B Employment Date Termination Date addressNumber addressStreet addressTown addressParish addressPostOffice {props.canCancel && ( Cancel )} {props.canConfirm && ( Submit )}

{props.successText}

{ // // }
)}; export default CreateUserForm;
